articles.author: Joshua Nelken-Zitser
articles.title: A remote town is looking for a doctor. They're offering $428,000, free rent, and a car allowance. - Business Insider
articles.description: An isolated Australian town is offering a lucrative salary of up to $428,000, free rent, and car allowance to attract a doctor to live in the Outback.
articles.content:
A remote town in the Australian outback is looking for a doctor. To sweeten the deal, the town is offering a generous salary, rent-free accommodation, and a car allowance.
The catch? You'd be the on… [+2276 chars]
